title.value: Effect of fiber fractional composition on digestibility of feeds in dry cows
Влияние фракционного состава клетчатки на переваримость кормов коровами в период сухостоя

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Kurepin, A.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: Increase in structural carbohydrates (concentration of neutral detergent fiber (NDF) over 42 % and of lignin over 5.5 % in DM of a diet) in a diet of cows in the dry period inhibits nutrient digestibility of feeds. When the NDF and the ADF (acid de-tergent fiber) content in the DM of a diet was reduced digestibility of all nutrients tended to increase
